short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent user from opening multiple tab of same url and redirect them to existing tab. Hence prevent unnecessary tab cluttering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prevent user from opening multiple tab of same url and redirect them to existing tab. Hence prevent unnecessary tab cluttering.

And with version 1.6 , it introduces a sophisticated feature designed to enhance your browsing experience: the consolidation of all browser windows into one, while intelligently eliminating duplicate tabs
